TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_R’uyan, title = R’uyan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/R’uyan} }

S.FORM: = R'uyan = Gaga mniq Sincuseyn Ufungsyang ka alang R'uyan. 92 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 237 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 89% niqan 212 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 11% niqan 25 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal82%, Amis4%, Bunun2%, Saysiyat1%. Hangan alang Hangan alang alang Pay-ran(R'uyan) Thuyang alang Pnseanak alang: " Ryaw-wu-yeyn" mririh saw egu qnpringan rqnux. Nniqan alang Nniqan Sin-cu-seyn Wu-fung-syang Taw-san-cun. Klbangan Llbangan ga daya Cing-cyueyn, igi siyaw daya Sang-ping-si, Ga hraan hidaw Wu-cwey-san. Kndkilan lnglingay Nniqan llingay Dxgal sttuan, knbaraw 1000-1500m. Kklaan ppanan Pgkla ppanan rulu. Mgriq rulu: Tduwa muda Seng-taw 122(Nan-cing kung-ru), paah Cu-tung mkala dgiyaq mtmay Wu-fung, muuda Maw-pu doniqan kingal wayay elug mquri elug ppanan pnegalang Pay-ran, mtmay do dhuq Pay-ran da. Ida tduwa mniq brah mmowsa alang Cing-cyueyn siida niqan tru elug wayay, mqurielug Pay-ran do dhuq da. Mlutuc syusan teync Mlutuc teyn-c ti-tu. Nniqan seejiq alang Klgan seejiq alang. Skari kari Skari kari:kari Atayal, kari Tlu. Snhiyaan Snhiyan cung-cyaw. Pnyahan alang Pnyahan alang Kari Atayal ga Ryaw-Wu-yeyn ksun o " Egu qnpringan rqnux".Babaw klwaan Tanah Tunux do, keysacu Tanah Tunux ga, phiyug sapah ptasan ni ciway sapah pyasan kska alang, duri ni, thjilan kingal alang kana ka gisu kghak mniq kneinu na Atayal, saw nii pslian mrahul ga kari Atayal o "Tu-nan" ksun. Kiya ni manu ka Tanah Tunux o bqanan dha suyang bhangan "Pay-ran" da.Kiya ka kiya ni tnealang o bqanan dha hnang "Pas-qu-nan" (paskwalan), bukuy kwan-fu do djyan dhuq sayang ka Pay-ran ksun. Kklaan rrigaw pgkla rgrigan kwan-kwang. Pnyahan bnatas Qtaan bnatas

= R'oyan = Gaga mniq Sincoseyn Ufongsyang ka alang R'oyan. 92 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 237 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 89% niqan 212 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 11% niqan 25 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal82%, Amis4%, Bonon2%, Saysiyat1%. Hangan alang Hangan alang alang Pay-ran(R'oyan) Thoyang alang Pnseanak alang: " Ryaw-wo-yeyn" mririh saw ego qnpringan rqnox. Nniqan alang Nniqan Sin-co-seyn Wo-fong-syang Taw-san-con. Klbangan Llbangan ga daya Cing-cyoeyn, igi siyaw daya Sang-ping-si, Ga hraan hidaw Wo-cwey-san. Kndkilan lnglingay Nniqan llingay Dxgal sttoan, knbaraw 1000-1500m. Kklaan ppanan Pgkla ppanan rolo. Mgriq rolo: Tdowa moda Seng-taw 122(Nan-cing kong-ro), paah Co-tong mkala dgiyaq mtmay Wo-fong, mooda Maw-po doniqan kingal wayay elog mqori elog ppanan pnegalang Pay-ran, mtmay do dhoq Pay-ran da. Ida tdowa mniq brah mmowsa alang Cing-cyoeyn siida niqan tro elog wayay, mqorielog Pay-ran do dhoq da. Mlotoc syosan teync Mlotoc teyn-c ti-to. Nniqan seejiq alang Klgan seejiq alang. Skari kari Skari kari:kari Atayal, kari Tlo. Snhiyaan Snhiyan cong-cyaw. Pnyahan alang Pnyahan alang Kari Atayal ga Ryaw-Wo-yeyn kson o " Ego qnpringan rqnox".Babaw klwaan Tanah Tonox do, keysaco Tanah Tonox ga, phiyog sapah ptasan ni ciway sapah pyasan kska alang, dori ni, thjilan kingal alang kana ka giso kghak mniq kneino na Atayal, saw nii pslian mrahol ga kari Atayal o "To-nan" kson. Kiya ni mano ka Tanah Tonox o bqanan dha soyang bhangan "Pay-ran" da.Kiya ka kiya ni tnealang o bqanan dha hnang "Pas-qo-nan" (paskwalan), bokoy kwan-fo do djyan dhoq sayang ka Pay-ran kson. Kklaan rrigaw pgkla rgrigan kwan-kwang. Pnyahan bnatas Qtaan bnatas
